Feature:
Food outlet information and menus can
be viewed, and orders placed, on one
Platform
Perceived advantage: Orders can be placed with little effort
Perceived drawback:
It is too easyand it takes no effort to purchase
takeaway food

Feature:
A greater number of food outlets are
accessible compared with other purchas-
ing formats
Perceived advantage:
Food outlets,cuisines,and price points,includin
those not normally available,can be selected
Perceived drawback:
Selecting a food outlet is difficult because there is
too much choice

Feature: Unique promotional offers can be used
Perceived advantage:
Money can be saved, additional food items can be
received, and meals can be delivered for free
Perceived drawback:
It is too appealing to place orders when promotion
Offers are available

Feature:
Takeaway food'can be purchased
Mealsare delivered
Perceived advantage:
The available food meets expectations
Takeaway food can be received without leaving home
Perceived drawback:
The available food is mostly unhealthy
Having takeaway food delivered when it is nearby
might be lazy

Feature: Delivery typically involves an additional fee
Perceived advantage:
Paying a  Delivery fee is worth it to carry out other
